content: 在这款游戏中，一旦落单死亡玩家就会被AI替代，它会复制你的长相，甚至用你的声音和行为混入团队，继续和队友交流，并伺机而动刀掉所有玩家。这就是全新多人联机AI生存恐怖游戏，游戏支持中文，支持四人联机。你和小伙伴白天需要乘坐电车一路跑图，搜刮资源，维持电车的行驶，到了夜晚则要躲避怪物和诅咒之语，一旦下车落单就会遭遇恐怖袭击，这时雷亚就会取代你继续伺机而动，因此你们将会时刻陷入对队友真实身份的质疑，为了生存和取得彼此的信任，你们只有不断自证清白，才能和队友一起逃出生天活下去。游戏将于10月27日上线，快叫上你的小伙伴一起冲吧。关注熊喵，玩游戏不迷路。

key_facts: FACT: In the game, a dead player is replaced by an AI that mimics their appearance and voice.
FACT: The AI-controlled replacement continues interacting with teammates and attempts to eliminate them.
FACT: The game is a multiplayer survival horror title with four-player online support.
FACT: Players must travel by train during the day to collect resources and keep the vehicle running.
FACT: At night, players must avoid monsters and dangerous 'cursed words' that trigger attacks.
FACT: Falling behind or becoming separated from the group results in immediate attack by supernatural forces.
FACT: The AI replacement can only activate when a player dies while isolated.
FACT: The game features psychological tension centered on distrust between teammates.
FACT: Players must constantly prove their identity to maintain trust within the group.
FACT: The game is set to launch on October 27th and supports Chinese language.
FACT: The core gameplay revolves around cooperation, deception, and survival under paranoia.
key_opinions: OPINION: The AI replacement mechanic creates intense psychological horror through constant suspicion.
OPINION: The blend of teamwork and betrayal makes this game uniquely terrifying compared to others.
OPINION: The day-night cycle adds strategic depth and escalating tension throughout gameplay.
OPINION: The voice mimicry feature significantly enhances immersion and fear of deception.
OPINION: The need for self-verification may frustrate some players but strengthens narrative impact.
OPINION: The train-based resource management adds a unique layer of cooperative pressure.
OPINION: The game’s premise is more compelling than typical horror titles due to its social dynamics.
key_datapoints: DATA: Supports up to four-player online co-op gameplay.
DATA: Players must maintain train operation by gathering resources during daytime.
DATA: Nighttime introduces monsters and cursed speech triggers that cause instant danger.
DATA: AI replacement activates only after a solo death event.
DATA: The game includes full Chinese language support.
DATA: Survival depends on both physical evasion and social trust-building.
